text: the sons of5:31 Reaiah. Jairus, the sons of5:31 Rezin. Daisan, the sons of5:31 Nekoda. Noeba, the sons of Chaseba, the sons of5:31 Gazzam. Gazera, the sons of5:31 Uzza. Ozias, the sons of5:31 Paseah. Phinoe, the sons of Asara, the sons of5:31 Besai. Basthai, the sons of5:31 Asnah. Asana, the sons of5:31 Meunim. Maani, the sons of5:31 Nephisim. Naphisi, the sons of5:31 Bakbuk. According to other readings, Acum, or Acuph. Acub, the sons of5:31 Hakupha. Achipha, the sons of5:31 Harhur. Asur, the sons of Pharakim, the sons of5:31 Bazluth. Basaloth,
